<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/members/{memberId}/tiers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the history of tiers assigned to a member with pagination

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"memberId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"ID of the member"},{"name":"page","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":1},"description":"Page number for pagination"},{"name":"limit","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":50,"default":10},"description":"Number of items per page"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
